name: token-beam-blender-plugin
description: Sync design tokens (colors) from any web app to Blender in real-time

scripts.install:blender: mkdir -p "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Blender" && BLENDER_SCRIPTS="$(find "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Blender" -type d -name scripts | sort | tail -n 1)" && if [ -z "$BLENDER_SCRIPTS" ]; then echo 'No Blender scripts directory found. Launch Blender once first.'; exit 1; fi && mkdir -p "$BLENDER_SCRIPTS/addons/token_beam" && SYNC_URL="${SYNC_SERVER_URL:-ws://localhost:8080}" && awk -v sync="$SYNC_URL" '/^SYNC_SERVER_URL = "/ { print "SYNC_SERVER_URL = \"" sync "\""; next } { print }' token_beam/__init__.py > "$BLENDER_SCRIPTS/addons/token_beam/__init__.py" && echo "Installed to $BLENDER_SCRIPTS/addons/token_beam"
scripts.uninstall:blender: for ADDON_DIR in "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Blender"/*/scripts/addons/token_beam; do if [ -d "$ADDON_DIR" ]; then rm -rf "$ADDON_DIR" && echo "Removed $ADDON_DIR"; fi; done
